alert.note: Alert for Avoyelles; Evangeline; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 26 at 8:01PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EVANGELINE...SOUTHWESTERN AVOYELLES AND NORTH CENTRAL ST. LANDRY PARISHES THROUGH 845 PM CST... At 801 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Reddell, or near Mamou, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to vegetation and outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ville Platte, Bunkie, Mamou, Turkey Creek, Pine Prairie, Bayou Chicot, Indian Lake, Chicot State Park, Whiteville, Beaver, Reddell, Grand Prairie, and St. Landry. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 32 and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
